doc:
Gene Lyons (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gene_Lyons_(actor) 0 Gene Lyons (February 9, 1921 – July 8, 1974) was an American television actor from Pittsburgh, best known for his role as police commissioner Dennis Randall on the NBC detective series Ironside starring Raymond Burr. Gene_Lyons ( February_9_,_1921 – July_8_,_1974 ) was an_American_television_actor from Pittsburgh , best_known for his_role as police_commissioner_Dennis_Randall on the_NBC_detective_series_Ironside starring Raymond_Burr .
